definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

sentences.english: I saw her father with his rosette on, canvassing for the Conservatives.
sentences.chinese: 我看见她父亲戴着玫瑰花结，正在为保守党游说拉票。

sentences.english: There is a great divide between liberals and conservatives in the government.
sentences.chinese: 政府泾渭分明地分为了自由党和保守党两个党派。

sentences.english: He argues that the Tories will always be seen as the party of privilege.
sentences.chinese: 他的论调是，保守党总是被看作特权阶级的党派。

sentences.english: The Conservative Party barely squeaked through in parliament.
sentences.chinese: 保守党在议会里勉强获胜。

sentences.english: Mr Cameron set out to rebrand the Tories as kinder and greener. It worked.
sentences.chinese: 卡麦隆着手重塑保守党的形象，使其更加友善和环保。

sentences.english: The Queen blames the Tories for everything, from ingrowing toenails to cholera.
sentences.chinese: 从趾甲倒生到霍乱，女王把大事小事都归咎于保守党。

sentences.english: Despite the rhetorical force of her convictions, some Tory colleagues accuse her of inconsistency.
sentences.chinese: 尽管宣称一以贯之，有些保守党指责她言行不一。

sentences.english: No wonder leading Tories welcome Brooks.
sentences.chinese: 难怪保守党的头头脑脑们会如此欢迎布鲁克斯。

sentences.english: Officials of the Labor Party and the Conservative Party say they support the proposal.
sentences.chinese: 目前英国工党和保守党都已有官员表示支持这一提案。

sentences.english: The Conservative-led coalition government is more diplomatic.
sentences.chinese: 外交手段越来越为由保守党领导的联合政府所青睐。

sentences.english: He soon became a reliable true-blue country club conservative.
sentences.chinese: 他不久就成了保守党乡村俱乐部忠诚的铁杆成员。

sentences.english: Why did the Tories ever allow social questions to be colonised by socialism?
sentences.chinese: 为什么保守党人总是让社会问题遭到社会主义的殖民？

sentences.english: Tories cocked a snook at their prime minister over this legislation.
sentences.chinese: 保守党人就这一法规向他们的首相表示了轻蔑。

sentences.english: The candidate is clearly on-message with the Tory party leader.
sentences.chinese: 这位候选人显然跟保守党领袖观点一致。

sentences.english: You have the conservative, Anglican royalists.
sentences.chinese: 保守党和教会的保皇党。

sentences.english: Two of the Tories’ obstinacies look especially worrying.
sentences.chinese: 两个保守党的顽症也让人特别担心。

definition: lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
seat in a parliament or legislative assembly
to withdraw from the European Union/abbr. for 脫離歐盟|脱离欧盟
